text: Korai railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Korai town. Its code is KRIH. It has two platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Korai railway station. ==Major Trains== * East Coast Express ==References== ==See also== * Jajpur district Category:Railway stations in Jajpur district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Korai railway station
